SELECT enterprise_operate.iid, enterprise_operate.oid, enterprise_operate.eid, enterprise_operate.operate, enterprise_operate.operate_time, operate_table.name AS operate_name, operate_table.avatar AS operate_avatar, enterprise_table.name AS enterprise_name FROM enterprise_operate LEFT JOIN account_info AS operate_table on enterprise_operate.oid = operate_table.aid LEFT JOIN enterprise AS enterprise_table on enterprise_operate.eid = enterprise_table.eid
operate_table.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') OR enterprise_table.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
ORDER BY enterprise_operate.operate_time DESC
